item.title: Top 8 Productivity Tips for Any Developer
The Importance of Unlearning
item.description: The Importance of Unlearning The world of software is changing constantly at a very fast pace. Yesterday’s axioms might be tomorrow’s anti-patterns. Newborn technologies rise to popularity and most of them will become obsolete sooner than expected and hardware advancements make game changers for things that were considered as science-fiction a few years ago. The only certainty is that we don’t know what the future will bring us. Here is a partial list of recent years emerging technologies:
